channel.title: age on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in age on Stats On the T

item.title: Ages at the US Open are Getting Bimodal, Again
item.description: With 22 year-old Belinda Bencic, 19 year-old Bianca Andreescu, and twenty-three year-olds Daniil Medvedev and Matteo Berrettini into the US Open semifinals; are we seeing the first wave of a new generation of dominant players at Majors?

item.title: Do Numbers Back Up A Changing of the Guard at the 2019 Australian Open?
item.description: In his win over Roger Federer, 20 year-old Stefanos Tsitsipas not only earned the biggest upset of the 2019 Australian Open so far, he caused many to wonder whether tennis was seeing the start of a new era. Tsitsipas’s journey at the 2019 AO is the biggest of multiple success stories for a young crop of talents on the men’s tour, stories that have already made this year one of the most unique in AO history.
